  • Method Details

    • addEmbargo

      void addEmbargo(String userId, String subjectId, String[] forcedEmbargoGroups) throws org.hippoecm.repository.api.WorkflowException, RepositoryException, RemoteException
      Adds the embargo to the current document. The user ID used to fetch the group of the user and mark the document so that it will only be available for users in the same group.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      Throws:
      org.hippoecm.repository.api.WorkflowException
      RepositoryException
      org.hippoecm.repository.api.MappingException
      RemoteException
